steps.name: Create docker-network
steps.label: Environment setting
steps.description: Before running any docker-compose files, create the opensearch-net network

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper Logs exporter
steps.label: Logs Exporter
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper logs pipeline and export into opensearch index
steps.content:
otel-logs-pipeline:
  workers: 5
  delay: 10
  source:
    otel_logs_source:
      ssl: false
  buffer:
    bounded_blocking:
  sink:
    - opensearch:
        hosts: ["https://opensearch-node1:9200"]
        username: "admin"
        password: "my_%New%_passW0rd!@#"
        insecure: true
        index_type: custom
        index: otel-events-%{yyyy.MM.dd}
        bulk_size: 4

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper Traces exporter
steps.label: Traces Exporter
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Traces pipeline and export into opensearch index
steps.content:
entry-pipeline:
  delay: "100"
  source:
    otel_trace_source:
      ssl: false
  sink:
    - pipeline:
        name: "raw-pipeline"
    - pipeline:
        name: "service-map-pipeline"
raw-pipeline:
  source:
    pipeline:
      name: "entry-pipeline"
  processor:
    - otel_trace_raw:
  sink:
    - opensearch:
        hosts: [ "https://opensearch-node1:9200" ]
        insecure: true        
        username: "admin"
        password: "my_%New%_passW0rd!@#"
        index_type: trace-analytics-raw

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper Metrics exporter
steps.label: Metrics Exporter
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Metrics pipeline and export into opensearch index
steps.content:
otel-metrics-pipeline:
  workers: 8
  delay: 3000
  source:
    otel_metrics_source:
      health_check_service: true
      ssl: false
  buffer:
    bounded_blocking:
      buffer_size: 1024 # max number of records the buffer accepts
      batch_size: 1024 # max number of records the buffer drains after each read
  processor:
    - otel_metrics:
        calculate_histogram_buckets: true
        calculate_exponential_histogram_buckets: true
        exponential_histogram_max_allowed_scale: 10
        flatten_attributes: false
  sink:
    - opensearch:
        hosts: ["https://opensearch-node1:9200"]
        username: "admin"
        password: "my_%New%_passW0rd!@#"
        insecure: true
        index_type: custom
        index: ss4o_metrics-otel-%{yyyy.MM.dd}
        bulk_size: 4
        template_type: index-template

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper Services exporter
steps.label: Services Exporter
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Services Processor to build the service network map pipeline and export into opensearch index
steps.content:
service-map-pipeline:
  delay: "100"
  source:
    pipeline:
      name: "entry-pipeline"
  processor:
    - service_map_stateful:
  sink:
    - opensearch:
        hosts: ["https://opensearch-node1:9200"]
        insecure: true
        username: "admin"
        password: "my_%New%_passW0rd!@#"
        index_type: trace-analytics-service-map

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper inside Otel Collector
steps.label: OTEL Collector Logs services
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Pipelines within the Otel Processor logs pipeline
steps.content:
otlp/logs:
    endpoint: "data-prepper:21892"
    tls:
      insecure: true
      insecure_skip_verify: true 
  service:
  pipelines:
    logs:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch]
      exporters: [otlp/logs, debug]

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper inside Otel Collector
steps.label: OTEL Collector Traces services
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Pipelines within the Otel Processor Traces pipeline
steps.content:
otlp/traces:
    endpoint: "data-prepper:21890"
    tls:
      insecure: true
      insecure_skip_verify: true 
  service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch]
      exporters: [otlp, debug, spanmetrics, otlp/traces]

steps.name: Configure Data-Prepper inside Otel Collector
steps.label: OTEL Collector Metrics services
steps.description: Configure Data-prepper Pipelines within the Otel Processor Metrics pipeline
steps.content:
otlp/metrics:
    endpoint: "data-prepper:21891"
    tls:
      insecure: true
      insecure_skip_verify: true 
  service:
  pipelines:
    metrics:
      receivers: [otlp, spanmetrics]
      processors: [filter/ottl, transform, batch]
      exporters: [otlphttp/prometheus, otlp/metrics, debug]
